name: Rob-BOTS!
description:
Rob-BOTS! is a simulation strategy game where the player takes control of a robot robber whose goal is to get 1 million scraps (currency) and to be the richest robber ever programmed. The game has 3 main levels with each having their own theme being a maze theme, a hallway theme and a hub theme. Owners that are present in the house also behave and patrol randomly depending on the theme and the current situation. There will also be various traps that the player has to avoid and doors to hack or scan to gather much more precious loot behind it. So, take control of a robot and steal, sell and upgrade to be the richest robot to ever be programmed.

#################################################

🥈Top 2nd Mobile Game in University 2019 - KDU Jingle Mingle🥈

Rob-BOTS! was chosen as one of the game to be showcased in Comic Fiesta 2019.
Comic Fiesta event in December 2019.

#################################################

Creator Notes

Team : S.I.M [Super Intelligent Mammals] (1 Designer, 2 Artists & 3 Programmers)
Role : Lead Programmer & Gameplay Programmer (Stevannus)
Engine : Unity
Module : Game Project Studio 2
Duration : 12 Weeks (Jan 2019 - Apr 2019)

Credits - S.I.M : Kugen Keith, Stevannus Lake, Sim Chew, Erick Ritcher Lim, Nicholas Tung Ka Sin, Felicia Wu
